snippet: The Vietnamese-born Conceptual artist Danh Vo has won this year’s Hugo Boss Prize; old master paintings will be displayed at Sotheby’s.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Vietnamese-born Conceptual artist Danh Vo wins 2012 Hugo Boss Prize, $100,000 awarded by Solomon R Guggenheim Museum; Sotheby's will show examples of old master paintings from auctions in London and New York at viewing for Impressionist and Modernist art sales; al-Sabah Collection, one of world's greatest collections of Islamic art, is lending 60 objects to Museum of Fine Arts,  Houston, as part of five-year renewable agreement.
lead_paragraph: The Vietnamese-born Conceptual artist Danh Vo has won this year’s Hugo Boss Prize; old master paintings will be displayed at Sotheby’s.

headline.seo: Danh Vo Wins the Guggenheim Foundation’s Hugo Boss Prize
headline.main: Native of Vietnam Wins Hugo Boss Prize
headline.print_headline:
Native of Vietnam
Wins Hugo Boss Prize
